product_name: REI Merino Wool Hiking Crew Socks
long_description: With naturally wicking fibers, REI Merino Wool Hiking Crew Socks are a comfortable choice for the trail. Made of merino lambswool with nylon and spandex for durability and dependable fit. Soft midweight padding underfoot cushions your steps; padded insteps relieve pressure from laces. Mesh knit ventilation panels over instep allow airflow and more moisture movement. Elastic arch bands hold socks in place and promote circulation. Uniquely formed toe area and Lin-Toe(R) ''no-feel'' seams keep socks smooth and nonirritating. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: With naturally wicking fibers, REI Merino Wool Hiking Crew Socks are a comfortable choice for the trail.
